snippet: A reader discusses the president-elect’s turnabout on Wall Street, and another questions having two Marine generals in the top defense posts....
lead_paragraph: A reader discusses the president-elect’s turnabout on Wall Street, and another questions having two Marine generals in the top defense posts.
